dashboard.label: Distributed Management Console - II
dashboard.description: The new Distributed Management Console (DMC) provides a complete monitoring console, including topology views, system status, and health alerting, for all components of an on-premise deployment. DMC creates a single interface to view the status, performance, capacity, and interconnectivity of these components
